snippet: Adrian Peterson, the star running back of the Minnesota Vikings, was booked and released from a Texas jail early Saturday on a charge that he spanked one of his sons with a wooden switch.
lead_paragraph: Adrian Peterson, the star running back of the Minnesota Vikings, was booked and released from a Texas jail early Saturday on a charge that he spanked one of his sons with a wooden switch.

headline.main: Vikings’ Peterson Is Booked and Released
headline.print_headline: Vikings’ Peterson Is Booked and Released
